attributes.comment: CMS should develop Trust Framework to align with the Federal laws and State policies and regulations to ensure compliance with them. The trust framework should promote the information sharing agreements with the Healthcare providers and all the relevant stakeholders to ensure timely reporting of the data that needs to access by the various service consumers.  As a result of this trust framework various assertions can be made to track the data owner and compliance with various laws and regulations.  This Trust Framework can follow the example the work done by the IJIS Institute and Georgia Tech Research Institute (GTRI) to address the information sharing among various stakeholders at Federal, State, Local, Territorial, Tribal, Private sector, and International partners to share the data in a distributed manner.  https://sites.gatech.edu/icif/
